---
category: news
title: "MetrixLab Adds Voice Recordings to Consumer Surveys"
excerpt: "Insights provider MetrixLab says it is trialling a methodology allowing respondents to answer survey questionnaires using voice recordings. According to the firm, spoken comments offer the potential to enhance research results by delivering a 'richness of information' which it claims is often difficult to deliver within the confines of traditional online surveys."
